example.eg: He is so understanding with his employees.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 同情的, 能体谅人的, 富于同情心的

example.eg: Sorry for the delay, and thank you for being so understanding.
example.egtrans: 我们对延误表示歉意，同时也很感谢您的谅解。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 宽容的, 谅解的, 理解的

example.eg: Most people's understanding of other countries is limited.
example.egtrans: 大多数人对其它国家的了解都相当有限。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 了解, 理解, 认识

example.eg: I might be wrong, but it is my understanding that they are no longer dating.
example.egtrans: 或许我错了，但据我所知他们不再约会了。

example.eg: The two nations reached an understanding on oil transport.
example.egtrans: 两国达成石油运输的协定。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 协定, 协议, 共识

example.eg: The communist had a different understanding of the world.
We used to quarrel a lot, but now we have a really good understanding.
example.egtrans: 我们过去常常吵架，不过现在我们相处得和睦融洽。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 相互理解, 相互体谅, 和睦融洽

example.eg: She is a great therapist and has great understanding.
We are closed until the end of January. Thank you for your understanding.
example.egtrans: 我们将闭店至1月底。感谢您的理解。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 宽容, 理解, 谅解

example.eg: Do you understand what I'm saying?
She doesn't understand algebra.
She can't understand the instructions.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 领会，了解, 阐释，把…解释为

example.eg: I don't fully understand the traffic laws, so I can't advise you.
example.egtrans: 我没有熟悉全部的交通法规，所以没办法给你建议。

example.eg: I understand that the situation is grave.
I understand them to be very nice people.
example.egtrans: 我相信他们是非常好的人。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 知道, 认为, 相信

example.eg: We understand the contract to be valid.
example.egtrans: 我们认同合约是有效的。

example.eg: When my husband says the food I've cooked is "interesting," I understand him to mean he doesn't like it.  I understood John to be in Fiji, but I had it completely wrong; he was in Venezuela.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 推断某人会做某事, 推测某人做某事, 猜想某人做某事

example.eg: Although I don't agree with him, I understand his point of view.
example.egtrans: 尽管我不同意他的观点，不过我很理解。

example.eg: I understand that you hate her.  Is this true?
example.egtrans: 我听说你很讨厌她。此事当真？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 知道, 听说, 获悉

example.eg: Sorry, I don't understand you; could you speak more slowly.
I don't understand you! How could you do something like that?
Why Janet stayed with her cheating husband is beyond all understanding.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 难以理解, 不可理解

example.eg: Quantum theory was beyond Simon's understanding.  What she sees in him is beyond understanding!
example.egtrans: 量子理论对于西蒙来说无法理解。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不可理解的, 无法理解的

example.eg: We have reached a common understanding.
The common understanding of the word "silent" is no noise whatsoever.
After playing he began to gain an understanding of the game.
My wife and I have an understanding: she does the cooking and I do the washing up.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 形成共识, 达成非正式协议

example.eg: We argued at first, but came to a mutual understanding eventually.
